title: [Yegharren Valley, Riverbed]
description: Piles of ancient stones, shaded by the overhanging branches of the oak forest and now half-covered with dirt and moss, mark the border of the river that flowed through the valley millions of years before.  Moonlight filters through the branches overhead, dappling the leaf-covered ground in an ever-shifting pattern of faint light and shadow.

Piles of ancient stones, shaded by the overhanging branches of the oak forest and now half-covered with dirt and moss, mark the border of the river that flowed through the valley millions of years before.  Sunlight filters through the branches overhead, dappling the leaf-covered ground in an ever-shifting pattern of light.
